events: 24 Hour Events:, ICP BOLT INSERTED - At [**2145-10-7**] 11:00 AM,   placed by neurosurgery in R. side skull, ICP CATHETER - START [**2145-10-8**] 12:00 AM,   placed [**2145-10-7**], FEVER - 102.3,F - [**2145-10-7**] 05:00 PM,   Remains intubated, mechanically ventilated.,   Remains in Coma.,   Continues to exhibit rhythmic movements of right foot. Occasionally,   exhibits left foot movemetns.  Occasionally tremors of head and upper,   torso.  Anticonvulsants adjusted, remains on Versed infusion.,   ICP remains 13-25 cmH2O, receiving mannitol q6h.,   History obtained from Medical records,   Patient unable to provide history: Unresponsive,

24 Hour Events:, FEVER - 101.1,C - [**2145-10-11**] 04:00 AM,   - On going family discussion re: code status and long term management,   - Neurology: requested slow wean off versed and reapplication if upper,   ext. sz activity.,   - Fi02 has not been weaned, still on 80%,   - Weaned versed, started propofol.,   - CTA of chest shows small mediastinal pneumothorax with subcutaneous,   air, and a collapsed lower LLL atelectasis and LRL consolidation.,   - Had bronchoscopy: copious purulent secretions in left lower >,   lingula, no obvious tracheal/bronchial injury.  BAL preformed in left,   lower lobe.,   -This am, ICP continued to be elevated; started versed gtt; neuro and,   neurosurg had no new recs.,
24 Hour Events:,   A- Line Placed,   Sedation increased. Paralytics given.,

24 Hour Events:,   -HTN: SBP in 180-->160,s with labetalol gtt; stopped gtt with,   initiation of propofol gtt,   -Began rewarming from Arctic sun cold vest starting at 10pm; pt began,   to shiver/have rigors,given fentanyl, versed, currently on propofol,   gtt, Meperidine 25mg IV x1. Pt continued to have rigors with fever to,   103.3 despite sedation and then placed back on cisatrcuronium gtt.,   -Social Work: consulted, f/u recs.,   -Neuro: consulted for am eval post-Arctic Sun vest,

24 Hour Events:, TRANSTHORACIC ECHO - At [**2145-10-5**] 08:35 AM: Normal global and,   biventricular systoic function with EF >75%.,   Urine tox pos for opiates and benzos.,   Loaded with Dilantin and Keppra. Dilantin level [**10-11**] so continued on,   100 IV q8., Continuous EEG overnight. Had focal seizures C3-P3-F3 leads per neuro,   prior to Keppra load. Re-evaluated after Keppra when pt having,   twitching, clonic motions RLE, occasionally alternating between R and,   L. Neuro evaluated overnight, reported that motions were myoclonus, not,   seizures, so wouldn't treat. No evidence of sz on EEG.,   Per neuro would have low threshold to CT if evidence Cushings triad,,   but would need to remove all EEG leads, FEVER - 102.0,F - [**2145-10-5**] 05:00 PM,   Hypertensive SBP 160s, fever curve trended down, tachycardic,   100s-110s.,   Approx. [**2-23**] am, dysynchronous with vent, sedation increased,
